name: dropkickpikachu
text: Creeeeepyyyyy.

name: deimosrising
text: We didn't see enough of these too. I hope they show up again someday.

name: deimosrising
text: Too? Maybe I should read my comments before I post them.

name: tragicone
text: A comment left by tragicone was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by getset_go, Unfun, EM2, DeimosRising, stop, Lokiamis, cailetshadow, charchar, Ciansy, Doc_Rostov)

name: tragicone
text:
Jesus Christ! I got 9 lames for this?

It is pretty clear you all don't get subtle humor.

name: tragicone
text:
i think that next no asherdan, i get the most lames.

maybe saint has me beat too.

name: redjoker
text: Well, maybe you should read your comments before you post them. Just saying.

name: wehavemagnums
text: His sleep talk is just adorable

name: catachresis
text:
The little "Heh!" by Ray's shoulder perfectly conveys how Ray has totally been called out and is trying to put a brave face on it
Just fucking perfect

name: brokeaccount
text: Just look at the shock on his face as Beef is talking. This is a man/cat who was not expecting to be taken apart so expertly, so swiftly. This is the face of a man/cat staring at his own unexpected demise.

name: professorhazard
text: Wait a minute... Ray doesn't wear a bracelet!

name: jonmw
text: He lost it at the last wedding with a trough of ranch dressing.

name: tekende
text: I don't care what you say or who you thought you knew you were, Roast Beef is destroying this cat.

name: evilbobikus
text: The perfectly accurate description, followed by nonchalantly going back to his drink.  Beef is fucking brutal.

name: tinhand
text:
Hooray for Roast Beefs overly specific descriptions of potential events.
Ray has probably eating a kilogram of bacon-wrapped shrimp before anyway.

name: starman11
text: I know that's my main reason for going to weddings.

name: cheeks_jd
text: I've said it before I'll say it again, those guys faces are FUCKED

name: cailetshadow
text:
I thought about it so I have to make other people think about it.

His eyes can probably still move around under that melted skin.

name: tekende
text: NOOOOOO!!

name: tragicone
text: Why so frightened/worried?

name: i_love_kate
text: Don't be silly. Eyeballs would melt long before the skin surrounding them.

name: echidnaboy
text: phew thank god for that

name: mr_lostman28
text: wait.... ewwwwww

name: bibendum
text: this is true.... please refer to Major Toht in: Raiders of the Lost Ark

name: swatson
text: Thank you. Thank you for saying that so I can never sleep again.

name: ashoykh
text: ray's arm in panel 6 is JACKED

name: unfun
text: It's just a fortuitous arrangement of armfat.

name: whiteturtle
text: That is the title of my first album.

name: mercuri0us
text: You could use that as a reply to almost any comment here and it would work.

name: stormagnet
text: I always kind of imagine Ray having the cat equivalent of the Sumo or Samoan body type- a shit-ton of muscle under that outer layer of fat.

name: chrissketch
text: These strips and the Robert Johnson hell strips confused me because I first read them on an old CRT monitor that was really dark and couldn't quite show the difference between a dark grey and black.

name: pa_ass_nts
text: Less than a year later Beef and Ray have an almost identical conversation. Persistent

name: tragicone
text: nuances rarely seen in other comics. And when I say rarely, i damn well mean it.

name: blarghamagarky
text: I like that we would probably  never get to see this conversation happening if there wasn't something bad happening to Philippe, and that no one knows about it. Because I really like this conversation

name: dwodles
text: These dudes are almost as frightening as Cartilage Head. Seriously. Hella scary.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs (Saturday - Monday)

Roast Beef: damn forgot about this blog what with things
Onstad: I learned how to play the Lottery.
Emeril: Fast Note on our day's Trashspotting

Today's Blogs

Pat: What a F *KING DISASTER.
Lyle: ey mahn hah pappies
Emeril: Trashspotters I have not abandoned you.

name: deusoma
text: That's right, kids! Pat even hates Daylight Savings Time! He's about as blatant an asshole as a person can get without tying helpless maidens to a train track.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: all twirling his mustache, all cackling madly.

name: tekende
text: To be fair, Daylight Savings Time is useless in this day and age and an annoying inconvenience. Someone ought to have the balls to do away with it.

name: puguglypress
text: I thought I was reading Pat's blog for a second there

name: mangtastic
text: I also think that DST is an annoying useless thing.  Why is it even needed?

name: drago25
text: Aw man I knew Onstad wouldn't take long to bring the creep back. Is all good though

name: unsentletter
text: Scary and distressing. Onstad can contrast two scenes within one strip hell -of hard. It's powerful.

name: red-barchetta
text: Uhhhh is that a elbow bone I see in panel 7 ?

name: waldo913
text: I didn't notice this my first time through the archives, but is there not something vaguely Charles Burns about the last 4 panels?  Anyone read Black Hole?

name: echidnaboy
text: I couldn't figure out what it was at first... It looked like one of those cheap, rubber Halloween masks you see in dime stores. It was just too fucked up to be human, but somehow, deep down inside I knew it was. His mouth was all busted up... broken teeth sticking out of pink gristle... His lips started moving and wet, sloppy sounds came out. I was scared shitless, but I just stood there staring at him, listening... trying to figure out what he was saying. "Go away... go away..."

name: waldo913
text: Hell yeah.

name: tripperday
text: Is the first mention of matrimony with Beef and Molly in the same sentence?

name: duperando
text: I have no idea why, but I think Zell and Cory are kind of cute in their own creepy, kindhearted way.

name: abuncha_nada
text:
the alt text seems to be Onstad's response to panels 3-9. Works 60% of the time, every time
PS - trying to work out italic text, sorry if it don't work

name: gournal
text: Yay, you did it!  I am so proud of you on the internet!
